title: House for immediate sale
details:
the one storied house and 7 perches land for sale in area most suitable for calm life style. 10min away from maharagama, boralesgamuwa, piliyandala town, as well as walking distance to 120 road, RMV and KDU Hospital.

2 bed rooms
1 living room
1 dining room
1 kichen
1 bathroom

*fully surrounded by wall and a gate.

Please call genuine buyers only
price negotiable
but no negotiation through the mobile
No brokers.
